article_text: Ilyce Glink joins Bill and Wendy to chat about her Affordable Care Act Seminar. Join WGN Radio’s Ilyce Glink on Friday, November 22nd from 8am – 12noon for “Obamacare Essentials for Small Business Owners, presented by WGN Radio & Country Financial” at the Hyatt Lodge McDonald’s Campus in Oakbrook, IL.

article_summary:
Ilyce Glink joins Bill and Wendy to chat about her Affordable Care Act Seminar.
Join WGN Radio’s Ilyce Glink on Friday, November 22nd from 8am – 12noon for “Obamacare Essentials for Small Business Owners, presented by WGN Radio & Country Financial” at the Hyatt Lodge McDonald’s Campus in Oakbrook, IL.
